name: Black Root Valley
description:
Black Root Valley is a small environment scene I made based on the concept art from Vladimir Manyukhin: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/y9lnn

This build is a playable version where you can walk around to get a better feel of the environment, mood and scale. For high resolution shots and a breakdown of the shaders used in this project visit: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/Vgo254

The project is made in Unreal Engine 4 and the assets used are from free Epic packs and the Quixel library.
